argument.description: An expression that returns a value of one of the following built-in data types: DATE, TIME, TIMESTAMP, time duration, timestamp duration, or a valid character string representation of a date, time, or timestamp that is not a CLOB.

description: The SECOND function returns the seconds part of a value with optional fractional seconds.
